item.title: Alan Kay's Hacker News AMA
item.description: Here are some highlights for the Hacker News AMA of Alan Kay, pioneering researcher in graphical user interfaces and object-oriented programming. Part of this was that the rather good idea of parsing non-command messages in each process – we used this in the first Smalltalk at Parc – became much too ad hoc because there was not a strong attempt to intertwine a real language around the message structures (this very same thing happened with http – just think of what this could have been if anyone had been noticing
